PARAMETER,VALUE,UNITS/NOTES
UPASserial,2061,(UPAS serial identification-numerical)
UPASfirmware,UPAS_v2_0-rev0138-L152RE_20230510_mbed116.bin compiledMay 11 2023_02:06:55UTC,(installed firmware version)
LifetimeSampleCount,38,(count-total lifetime sample runs)
LifetimeSampleRuntime,907.47,(hrs-total lifetime cumulative sample runtime)




SAMPLE IDENTIFICATION

UPASlogFilename,/sd/PS2061_LOG_2024-11-21T21_40_53UTC_no-log________________.txt,(log file filename-automatically defined)
SampleName,no-log_________,(Sample Name-user entered into app)
CartridgeID,___,(Cartridge Identification-user entered into app)




SETUP SUMMARY

GPSUTCOffset,-7.00,(hours offset from UTC date time)
StartOnNextPowerUp,0,(0=no 1=yes)
ProgrammedStartDelay,0,(s)
ProgrammedRuntime,360000000,(s) (360000000 means 'indefinite')
VolumetricFlowRate,1.000,(L*min^-1)
FlowOffset,0.000000,(%)
DutyCycle,100,(%)
DutyCycleWindow,30,(s)
GPSEnabled,1,(0=no 1=yes)
LogFileMode,0,(0=normal 1=debug)
LogInterval,30,(s)
AppLock,0,(0=unlocked 1=locked -1=not set)
AppVersion,i2.2.2,(i=iOS A=Android)




SAMPLE SUMMARY

StartDateTimeUTC,2024-11-21T21:40:53,(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) (UTC date time format)
StartDateTimeLocal,2024-11-21T14:40:53,(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) (Local date time format)
StartBatteryCharge,100,(%)
StartBatteryVoltage,3.82,(V)
EndDateTimeUTC,YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS,(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) (UTC date time format)
EndDateTimeLocal,YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS,(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) (Local date time format)
EndBatteryCharge,000,(%)
EndBatteryVoltage,0.00,(V)
ShutdownMode,1,(0=unknown error 1=user pushbutton stop 2=depleted battery [<2.8v] 3=completed preset sample duration 4=thermal protection shutdown 5=max power at initialization 6=max power during sample 7=blocked flow during sample)
SampledVolume,00000.00,(L)
SampledRuntime,000.000,(Hr)
LoggedRuntime,000.000,(Hr)
AverageVolumetricFlowRate,0.000,(L*min^-1)




SAMPLE LOG

(HH:MM:SS),(s),(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) (UTC date time format),(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) (Local date time format),(L*min^-1),(L),(C),(C),(C),(hPa),(hPa),(Pa),(%),(g*L^-1),(integer),(integer),(V),(g*min^-1),(V),(integer),(decimalDegree),(decimalDegree),(m),(integer),(m*s^-1),(-)
